definition: variant of 簡練|简练[jian3 lian4]
simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)

sentences.english: A simple language of small story, to study.
sentences.chinese: 一個語言簡煉的小故事，學習了。

sentences.english: Ling was a style of official documents, with its concise and simple stylistic features.
sentences.chinese: 令是下行公文中的一種，以簡煉樸實爲風格特徵。
